name: Real Toss
description:
Real Toss is suitable for the ones who would like to spend some pleasant time.
You should start to collect garbage only by using your finger but don't ever forget to take the wind into consideration!
You can play this game with realistic audio effects and graphics in 4 different themes: gym, office, bathroom and hospital.

Throwing 5 different objects, not only paper, was never this much fun before.

You will enjoy playing this game with 3 different difficulty levels and 12 stages without getting bored.

Features

- Shoot with 5 different objects
- 3 different difficulty levels
- 4 themes (hospital, gym, office, bathroom)
- Realistic audio and graphics
- 12 stages
- shooting against wind challenge
publishers: Mobil Interaktif Bilisim Hizmetleri Anonim Sirketi
